table.name: (select t_imstraindevice.device as device,t_imsdevice.name as devicename,t_imsdevice.room as room,t_imstraindevice.[state] as states,t_imsmarks.name as statename,t_imstraindevice.starttraindate as starttraindate,t_imstraindevice.endtraindate as endtraindate ,t_imstraindevice.teacher as teacher,t_imstraindevice.[description] as descriptions,t_imstraindevice.OBJ_ID as OBJ_ID,t_imstraindevice.ttype as ttype,t_imstraindevice.intrainingid as intrainingid,t_imstraindevice.memo as memo,t_imstraindevice.historystate as historystate from t_imstraindevice left join t_imsdevice on t_imsdevice.code=device left join t_imsmarks on t_imsmarks.paramgroup='DeviceRepair' and t_imsmarks.paramorder=[state] where ttype='设备维修' and [state]=1 and historystate=1) as imsrepair

(select t_imstraindevice.device as device,t_imsdevice.name as devicename,t_imsdevice.room as room,t_imstraindevice.[state] as states,t_imsmarks.name as statename,t_imstraindevice.starttraindate as starttraindate,t_imstraindevice.endtraindate as endtraindate ,t_imstraindevice.teacher as teacher,t_imstraindevice.[description] as descriptions,t_imstraindevice.OBJ_ID as OBJ_ID,t_imstraindevice.ttype as ttype,t_imstraindevice.intrainingid as intrainingid,t_imstraindevice.memo as memo,t_imstraindevice.historystate as historystate from t_imstraindevice left join t_imsdevice on t_imsdevice.code=device left join t_imsmarks on t_imsmarks.paramgroup='DeviceRepair' and t_imsmarks.paramorder=[state] where ttype='设备维修' and [state]=2 and historystate=1) as imsrepair

(select t_imstraindevice.device as device,t_imsdevice.name as devicename,t_imsdevice.room as room,t_imstraindevice.[state] as states,t_imsmarks.name as statename,t_imstraindevice.starttraindate as starttraindate,t_imstraindevice.endtraindate as endtraindate ,t_imstraindevice.teacher as teacher,t_imstraindevice.[description] as descriptions,t_imstraindevice.OBJ_ID as OBJ_ID,t_imstraindevice.ttype as ttype,t_imstraindevice.intrainingid as intrainingid,t_imstraindevice.memo as memo,t_imstraindevice.historystate as historystate from t_imstraindevice left join t_imsdevice on t_imsdevice.code=device left join t_imsmarks on t_imsmarks.paramgroup='DeviceRepair' and t_imsmarks.paramorder=[state] where ttype='设备维修' and historystate=2) as imsrepair

(SELECT t_imsdevice.name as name,t_imsdevice.code as code,t_imsroom.name as roomname,t_imsdevice.roomcode as roomcode,T_Device7sDetails.score as score,T_Device7sDetails.scoredate as scoredate FROM t_imsroom join t_imsdevice on t_imsroom.code=t_imsdevice.roomcode left join T_Device7sDetails on t_imsdevice.code=T_Device7sDetails.devicecode and T_Device7sDetails.scoredate=@scoredate where t_imsroom.manager=@manager) AS t_7sadd
table.adminname: (SELECT t_imsdevice.name as name,t_imsdevice.code as code,t_imsroom.name as roomname,t_imsdevice.roomcode as roomcode,T_Device7sDetails.score as score,T_Device7sDetails.scoredate as scoredate FROM t_imsroom join t_imsdevice on t_imsroom.code=t_imsdevice.roomcode left join T_Device7sDetails on t_imsdevice.code=T_Device7sDetails.devicecode and T_Device7sDetails.scoredate=@scoredate) AS t_7sadd
